name: Hale's Hatterie
description:
Hale's Hatterie is a hat building game made by four friends! Saxton Hale is away on an epic fight, and it's your job to take care of the Hatterie while he's off fighting another billionaire. Take orders and build hats from the brim to the top to the details for local mercenaries.

Made for the 2022 TF2Maps.net 72hr Jam

Jam Submission Link

Programming and Scripting - Sour Dani

Sprites and Textures - Peachdalooza

Sprites and Models - justyn

Scripting - Lexzach

Known Bugs:

  • Ordering is somewhat difficult
  • Hats are bundled together on left conveyer in "Brim" area
  • Hats in "Top" area are sparse and bundled
